info.title: Vuci API
info.description: API documentation for accessing various router services and their configurations

modem_id.description: Modem ID of the specified modem.

post.summary: Unblock SIM with PUK and set new PIN
Restarts the connection of the selected modem

get.summary: Returns APN values for all modems
Returns APN values for specified modem

modem.description: Modem which the SIM switch configuration belongs to.

position.description: SIM card position inside the modem.

enabled.description: Automatically switch between default and non-default SIM cards based on the various rules and criterias defined below

retry_count.description: Attempts before SIM switch. Fail count before switching to other SIM

on_signal.description: On weak signal. Perform a SIM card switch when a signal's strength drops below a certain threshold

weak_signal.description: Signal strength (dBm). Lowest signal's strength value in dBm below which a SIM card switch should occur

data_limit.description: On data limit. Perform a SIM card switch when mobile data limit for your current SIM card is exceeded

sms_limit.description: On SMS limit. Perform a SIM card switch when sent SMS limit for your current SIM card is exceeded

roaming.description: On roaming. Perform a SIM card switch when roaming is detected

no_network.description: No network. Perform a SIM card switch when network isn't detected

denied.description: On network denied. Perform a SIM card switch when network is denied

fail_flag.description: On data connection fail. Perform a SIM card switch when data connection fails

data_fail_host.description: Health monitor ICMP host. A remote host to ping (send an ICMP (Internet Control Message Protocol) packet to) and determine when connection goes down

data_fail_timeout.description: Health monitor ICMP timeout. A timeout value for ICMP (Internet Control Message Protocol) packet

enable_back.description: Switch back to default SIM card after timeout. Switch back to default SIM card after timeout has been reached

x-web.pretty: Switch back to default SIM card after timeout

switch_back.description: An initial timeout value in minutes after which a SIM card's switch-back to default SIM card should occur

modem.description: Modem which the SIM switch configuration belongs to.

position.description: SIM card section position inside the modem.

enabled.description: Automatically switch between default and non-default SIM cards based on the various rules and criterias defined below

retry_count.description: Attempts before SIM switch. Fail count before switching to other SIM

weak_signal.description: Signal strength (dBm). Lowest signal's strength value in dBm below which a SIM card switch should occur

roaming.description: On roaming. Perform a SIM card switch when roaming is detected

fail_flag.description: On data connection fail. Perform a SIM card switch when data connection fails

data_fail_host.description: Health monitor ICMP host. A remote host to ping (send an ICMP (Internet Control Message Protocol) packet to) and determine when connection goes down

data_fail_timeout.description: Health monitor ICMP timeout. A timeout value for ICMP (Internet Control Message Protocol) packet

enable_back.description: Switch back to default SIM card after timeout. Switch back to default SIM card after timeout has been reached

x-web.pretty: Switch back to default SIM card after timeout

switch_back.description: An initial timeout value in minutes after which a SIM card's switch-back to default SIM card should occur

name.description: List name. Only used for easier management

mcc_mnc.description: Operator's code used to identify a network operator. Allowed characters: (0-9)

name.description: List name. Only used for easier management

mcc_mnc.description: Operator's code used to identify a network operator. Allowed characters: (0-9)

modem.description: Modem which the SIM card section belongs to.

position.description: SIM card section position inside the modem.

primary.description: Default SIM. Enables the specified SIM card as a default

deny_roaming.description: Deny data roaming. Deny data connection on roaming

volte.description: VoLTE (Voice over LTE) is a digital packet technology that uses 4G LTE networks to route voice traffic and transmit data. (Only available for devices with 4G modems)

service.description: Service mode. If your local mobile network supports 2G/3G/4G/5G you can specify to which network you prefer to connect to

category_lte.description: Network Category. In LTE (4G) only you can specify network category: LTE Cat M1, LTE Cat NB1 or LTE Cat M1 + LTE Cat NB1

pincode.description: SIM card's PIN (Personal Identification Number) is a secret numeric password shared between a user and a system that can be used to authenticate the user.

pukcode.description: SIM card's PUK (Personal Unblocking Key) is a code consisting of 8 digits that can be used to unblock your SIM card when you entered 3 times a wrong PIN code.

lte_nb.description: LTE narrow bands. Manual 4G NB selection

signal_reset_enabled.description: Enables modem operator connection resetting based on signal threshold

signal_reset_threshold.description: Signal threshold in dB for the connection. When signal is under this value modem resets connection

signal_reset_timeout.description: Wait this long in seconds before trying to reset the connection again

operlist_name.description: Operator list. Operator's code list name. You can get/add them in /mobile/operator_lists

sms_limit_num.description: SMS limit count. Disable SMS sending after limit value is reached

sms_limit.description: Period for which SMS limiting should apply (day, week or month)

period.description: Start day/weekday/hour. A starting day/weekday/hour for mobile data limiting period

modem.description: Modem ID that should set the PIN for active SIM
Modem id that caused the error.
